reassignedits-error-invalid:
Error message which will be shown if given user name is invalid. Parameters:
* $1 - the old or new username
reassignedits-success:
Success message when user edits has been successfully moved from one user to another one.

Parameters:
* $1 - old username
* $2 - new username
reassignedits-summary: Short summary on Special:ReassignEdits how-to-use this extensions
